games.title: 3D Tank Battle
games.description: An intense multiplayer tank battle game in 3D. Battle against other players in real-time tank combat with realistic physics and explosive action.
games.how_to_play: Use WASD or arrow keys to drive your tank, tank turrets auto-fire. On mobile, use the virtual joystick to move!

games.title: Bruno Simon Portfolio
games.description: An interactive 3D portfolio where you drive a car through a playful environment
games.how_to_play: Use WASD or arrow keys to drive the car. Click and drag to look around. On mobile, use the virtual joystick!
